name: Kaiju Noir
storyline:
Deep beneath the surface of the earth the monsters of ancient times live in a city of stone and corruption. Unwelcome in the light of the sun, they exist in a world shaped by their experiences with humanity but never to be part of it.

In this city of ever-night you, a private investigator of Monsterburg, and your assistant receive a case that could either lead to wealth, or a watery grave.
summary: Kaiju Noir is a piece of pulp fiction tale of giant monsters in a world rebuilt in humanity’s image, for better or worse. Mysteries, corruption, & deception abound in this twisted city of stone.
